component_goals: Have a 170+ mph driver in the bag
1 or fewer big contact mistakes a round

Goal 1 (Driver): Complete Fit For Golf Strength Workout
Complete 20 Swing Speed session on fit for golf app
Able to hit 70%+ Middle of Face at Full Speed
Goal 2 (ground): Able to get 20/20 in the closest towel drill
Can cleanly hit 9/10 from fairway bunker
On course divots start after the ball 90%+
Goal 3 (flight): Complete a 20 shot session with 1 degree or less standard deviation of path
20 shot session with 1 degree or less face to path
Goal 4 (Putt): Able to measure slope within .5 degrees via AimPoint
Complete a 10 putt session with each falling within 10%
Create a pre-shot routine for putting
Goal 5 (70 and in): Complete a random 10 yardages with getting all 10 within 2 yards of target yardage
Finish a 10 shot pitching session with all 10 inside 8 feet
10 shot chipping session averaging under 2.0 shots (ie all up and down and one or more chip-in)
Create a sand gapping system w/ 5 yards max between shots
Goal 6 (Mental): Complete 20% of your practice sessions w/ the broken method
Create a pre shot routine for (Putt, ARG, Distance)
Complete 5 rounds with 100% AimPoint completion on the green
Use the same pre-shot routine for 3 rounds in a row
Get to a 75%+ commitment level on the course
